results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,r) = number of arrangements of n pennies in rows, with r contiguous pennies in the bottom row, and each higher row consisting of contiguous pennies, each touching two pennies in the row below (1 <= r <= n).

formula: T(n,r) = Sum_{D(n,r)} Product_{k=2..m} abs(p[k]-p[k-1]) where the sum ranges over all partitions of n into distinct parts with maximal part r and the product over the m-1 pairs of successive parts; m is the number of parts in the partition under consideration. [_Joerg Arndt_, Apr 09 2016]
